clue: I spin in silence through the sky. With moons nearby as stars drift by. What am I?

hints.text: I live in space but I’m not a star
I circle the sun from near or far
You live on one — it’s called Earth

clue: I roar to life and climb the sky, I chase the stars where eagles can’t fly. What am I?

hints.text: I travel upward, not on the ground
Fire and smoke help me lift off with sound
I take astronauts to space and back around

clue: I'm a green kingdom where tall trees touch sky, Home to deer, birds, and foxes sneaking by. What am I?

hints.text: I'm full of whispering leaves and hidden trails
Robin Hood hides here with his merry band
A place where bears nap and squirrels play all day

clue: I'm a sunny patch where colors grow tall, busy with life from the earth to the wall. What am I?

hints.text: I have butterflies fluttering and bees humming all day
I grow rows of veggies and flowers in pretty bloom
I’m where you plant seeds and pick fresh tomatoes in June

clue: I’m a clear square that lets the outside in, framing the world with a glassy grin. What am I?

hints.text: I show you raindrops and birds flying by
I’m made of glass you can open or shut
You look through me to see stars at night

clue: I show you back what you show to me, a twin that follows silently. What am I?

hints.text: I reflect your smile and every frown
I’m smooth and shiny, made of glass
You check me before you go out the door

clue: I'm a dark path carved through rock or hill, where lights lead you safely under still. What am I?

hints.text: I echo with footsteps and car whooshes too
I go under mountains, not over them
Trains and cars zoom through me to the other side

clue: I'm squishy and yellow, I soak up the wet, squeezing out water when bath time is set. What am I?

hints.text: I love to drink up spills on the floor
I’m full of holes but not a rock
Bob SquarePants lives in me under the sea

clue: I sail stormy seas with a flag black and bold, hunting for treasure in stories of old. What am I?

hints.text: I say 'Arrr!' and search for chests full of gold
I wear an eye patch and a hook for a hand
Captain Hook chases Peter Pan on my ship

clue: I swing from vines with a tail that's so fun, chattering loudly in the warm morning sun. What am I?

hints.text: I have a long tail I grab branches with
Curious George is my mischievous friend
I love bananas and make funny faces

clue: I guard your head when you ride fast or fall, shiny and strong, I answer the call. What am I?

hints.text: I strap under your chin for bumpy rides
I protect your brain on bikes or skates
Superheroes wear me to fight bad guys

clue: I'm fluffy and soft for your sleepy head, a cloud you hug when you're off to bed. What am I?

hints.text: I live on your bed and love sleepy hugs
I’m stuffed with feathers or squishy foam
You punch me to fluff it before lights out

clue: I catch the world in a tiny black box, freezing smiles and moments that never stop. What am I?

hints.text: I click when you say 'cheese!'
I have a lens that sees everything
You take selfies with me to show your friends

clue: I carry my house on my back so slow, hiding inside when the winds start to blow. What am I?

hints.text: I have a hard shell that's my safe little home
I walk super slow and love sunny rocks
Teenage Mutant Ninja ones eat pizza all day

clue: I breathe fiery flames with wings spread so wide, guarding old castles where treasures hide. What am I?

hints.text: I have scales and claws like a giant lizard
I fly through the sky with a roar so loud
Puff the Magic one loves a little girl

clue: I'm sweet and I'm round with a chewy delight, fresh from the oven on a cozy night. What am I?

hints.text: I have chocolate chips that melt in your mouth
I come warm from the oven with a yummy smell
The Cookie Monster on Sesame Street loves me best

clue: I glow soft and warm with a flickering light, melting away through the friendly night. What am I?

hints.text: I have a wick that burns with a tiny flame
I drip wax when I shine on birthdays
You blow me out and make a wish

clue: I squawk and I chatter with feathers so bright, copying words in the tropical light. What am I?

hints.text: I repeat everything you say back to me
I have colorful wings and a curved beak
I perch on pirate shoulders and mimic their talk

clue: I weave a home that shines with thread, I watch in silence where footsteps tread. What am I?

hints.text: I have eight legs but no shoes to wear
Some fear me, but I’m small and fair
I build webs almost anywhere

clue: I leave a trail but have no feet, I help make words and drawings neat. What am I?

hints.text: I get shorter the more I’m used
I often live inside a case or pouch
I help you write, sketch, and learn in school

clue: I’m full of chatter, books, and cheer, a place you visit year by year. What am I?

hints.text: You come to me to learn and play
I have teachers who guide the way
I’m where your classroom and friends stay

clue: I’m full of stars that shine so bright, a swirling wonder in the night. What am I?

hints.text: I float in space with stars all around
I can be spiral, big, or round
Our solar system lives inside me

clue: I hop along with ears held high, I twitch my nose as I pass by. What am I?

hints.text: I have long ears and soft, fluffy fur
I like to nibble on carrots and greens
I hop around in fields or gardens unseen

clue: I have many pieces that fit just right, I take some patience to finish tight. What am I?

hints.text: I can be made of shapes or pictures
You put me together piece by piece
I’m fun to solve when you have some peace

clue: I’m surrounded by water on every side, a quiet place where you can hide. What am I?

hints.text: I’m a patch of land in the sea
Some people live on me, some just visit
I can have beaches, forests, or mountains too
